meanings.definition: A taxonomic category ranking below an order and above a superfamily.
meanings.sent1: In the animal kingdom, the infraorder helps classify species into groups.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use the infraorder to organize different types of animals.
meanings.sent3: The infraorder decided to throw a party for all the taxonomic categories.
meanings.sent4: The infraorder acted like a bridge connecting orders and super families.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the infraorder makes understanding animal classification easier.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to an infraorder.
meanings.sent1: The researcher studied the infraorder characteristics of the species.
meanings.sent2: It is important to consider the infraorder features when classifying animals.
meanings.sent3: The infraorder-themed party decorations were a hit among scientists.
meanings.sent4: Her love for animals was as deep as the infraorder roots.
meanings.sent5: The infraorder traits were distinct and easily recognizable in the species.
